Responsible for the development & implementation of the Business & Marketing Strategy for Manual Mobility & Seating products in the EMEA region.  
 
Key responsibilities:
- Lead the Group of Categories - Passive, Low & Medium Active, Active and Seating - and work    together to develop complete user solutions. 
- Maximize their business potential thanks to the cross selling and the coordinated approach to the customers (dealers, therapist, end users, payers or internal customers). 
- Achieve all Business objectives all the Categories.
- Lead & develop team of 4 Group Product Managers (FTE's)

Essential Functions:
- Define the long term strategic plan for the different categories. Define targeting, positioning and pricing guidelines and how the different categories work together in order to maximize the value added to the Customers.
- Identify synergies between all the categories. Identify needs not covered today in the different categories and opportunities across the different portfolios.
- Follow KPIs, define new if needed. Develop Tactical plans in order to ensure that the business goals are achieved.
